---
title: "Media"
---

While many capstone projects have made substantial and long-lasting contributions on their sponsoring organization, many of those contributions never become public. 
Here, we note a few of the more public contributions. 

## 99P Labs project

- Capstone students wrote [a blog post](https://medium.com/99p-labs/navigating-telematics-data-1b59e09489c7) based on their experience "Navigating Telematics Data"

## ProPublica project

- Capstone students were acknowledged for their contributions to Sophie Chou and Brenda Medina's article ["Despite Audit, Doctors With Checkered Records Can Still Decide Fate of Green Card Seekers"](https://www.propublica.org/article/despite-audit-doctors-with-checkered-records-can-still-decide-fate-of-green-card-seekers) for ProPublica.  

> "Smith College Statistical and Data Science capstone students provided additional research."
